title: America abroad
creator_credit: Associated-Rediffusion, Intertel, Peter Hunt and Michael Ingrams
brief_description: Approximately 2,000,000 United States citizens live and work abroad, in some 70 nations which benefit from American aid. Four of these countries and some of these United States citizens are in Cambodia, Vietnam, Pakistan and Ghana.
creator_credit_for_label: Associated-Rediffusion, Intertel, Peter Hunt and Michael Ingrams
